name: LD48 - Flare
description:
Explore deeper and deeper.  Will it ever end?  Together you can find out.

Objective

Find your way through the puzzle with a friend (or on your own) as you explore deeper and deeper underground.

Challenge

One player plays first person and controls the flame while the other player helps them through the puzzle by manipulating the world.

Controls

Note: This game is intended to be local co-op but can be played single player.  If you choose to play single player you will need to switch views manually to be able to enjoy the game.
